Package io.opentelemetry.metrics

Interface MetricRegistry

  • public interface MetricRegistry
    Creates and manages a set of metrics for a library/application.
    Since:
    0.1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  MetricRegistry.Builder
      Builder class for the MetricRegistry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CounterDouble.Builder counterDoubleBuilder​(String name)
      Returns a builder for a CounterDouble to be added to the registry.
      CounterLong.Builder counterLongBuilder​(String name)
      Returns a builder for a CounterLong to be added to the registry.
      GaugeDouble.Builder gaugeDoubleBuilder​(String name)
      Returns a builder for a GaugeDouble to be added to the registry.
      GaugeLong.Builder gaugeLongBuilder​(String name)
      Returns a builder for a GaugeLong to be added to the registry.

    • Method Detail

      • gaugeLongBuilder

        GaugeLong.Builder gaugeLongBuilder​(String name)
        Returns a builder for a GaugeLong to be added to the registry.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the metric.
        Returns:
        a GaugeLong.Builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if name is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if different metric with the same name already registered.
        Since:
        0.1.0
